summary: Tommaso goes incredible lengths to win back the love of his former girlfriend Cecilia, but sometimes things change in the most unexpected way.
cast: Massimo Troisi|Francesca Neri|Marco Messeri|Angelo Orlando|Natalia Bizzi|Alessia Salustri|Nuccia Fumo|Anna Teresa Rossini|Daria Morelli|Antonio Sigillo|Corrado Taranto|Pia Velsi|Giovanni Vozzi
title: El amor no es lo que parece
